EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-12-20 AWS eBook Fifth Send - EMEA.ES-2018-12-20 AWS eBook Fifth Send - E
EmailTemplate.subject: =?UTF-8?Q?=F0=9F=86=93=F0=9F=93=96?= - Master AWS IaaS.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/aws-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4nAAAQ]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Want to learn how to design and deploy infrastructure-as-a-service (IaaS) solutions in the cloud using Amazon Web Services? Our latest eBook <[[https://turbonomic.com/aws-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4nAAAQ]]> can help!
In this eBook, we explore key components of the AWS public cloud platform and show you how to launch your compute and storage resources on the AWS Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) platform as well as how to add compute resources to your VPC with AWS Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2).
Download Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/aws-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4nAAAQ]]>
By the end of this ebook, you’ll master AWS core components and how to design for resiliency. You’ll even be able to launch and manage your cloud solution using either the AWS command-line interface or the AWS web console.
I hope you find it helpful!
Best, Andrew
